meaningMnemonic: A <radical>slice</radical> with a <radical>knife</radical> is called a <kanji>carve</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: You work up a sweat trying to <kanji>carve</kanji> meat and wood all day, so you grab yourself a nice <reading>Coke</reading> (こく). You like Coke, and it goes well with meat and sawdust.
